name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Python**, **FastAPI**, and **Pydantic**. Expert in deploying cloud-native solutions with **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and maintaining compliance with industry standards through rigorous **unit testing**, **integration testing**, and **end-to-end testing**. Proficient in utilizing **Git** for version control, conducting **code reviews**, and managing **pull requests** in an agile environment. Demonstrated ability to foster **communication** and **collaboration** across teams to deliver robust applications.

Proven track record in both frontend and backend development using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms emphasizing predictive analytics and real-time processing. Strong background in MLOps, including model training and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
